title: Inverted
description: Hold the pose and take normal breaths. Lower your legs over your head, place your arms on the floor, and slowly roll down with an exhale. Do not turn your neck Hips resting in palms Elbows close together Modification: Bend your knees while lifting and lowering your legs. Avoid this pose if you have high blood pressure, headache, neck injury, or a heart condition.
